DOC.brief_summary: Pregnant women who eligible with inclusion criteria are random to two groups. Aromatherapy group will receive the aromatherapy during labor along with standard pain control. Non-aromatherapy group will receive standard pain control during labor
DOC.criteria: Singleton pregnancy Nulliparous 37 complete weeks of gestation Cephalic presentation No emergency obstetric complication In labor Medical or obstetric complication preclude vaginal delivery Essential oil allergy Side effect of aromatherapy
